questions.question: Which star on the map would have greater access to the development of future trade with Europe?
Which two groups are in conflict over the control of Jerusalem?
How are Judaism, Christianity, and Islam similar?

choices.answer: they all started in different world regions
they share a belief in one god
they celebrate the same religious holidays

questions.question: True or False: Christianity began in the Middle East and spread to Europe.
What does Sawm or fasting mean?

choices.answer: to give up food and drink
to perform a pilgrimage to Mecca

questions.question: Why is Sawm important to Muslims?

choices.answer: to be able to give food to poor people
to develop a clear mind in order to be closer to Allah
to be able to enjoy food from their country

questions.question: What might happen if Middle Eastern countries work together on water issues?

choices.answer: they will be more willing to cooperate on other issues
the countries will have conflict over other issues
the countries will never need more water sources

questions.question: "Friends of the Earth Middle East" thinks that countries in the Middle East may...

choices.answer: never be able to resolve their conflict over land
be forced to go to war over water
cooperate because they all need water

questions.question: How would scarcity of a natural resource affect a country?

choices.answer: there would be an increase in per capita GDP
there would a decrease in per capita GDP
there would be an increase in life expectancy

questions.question: Which would help Afghanistan move from a less developed to a newly industrialized country?
What is a newly industrialized country?

choices.answer: a country that is somewhere between developing and developed

questions.question: What provided the Middle East region with a valuable resource for exporting?
Which waterway is important when the United States imports oil from the Persian Gulf region?
What effect has desalination had on settlement patterns?

choices.answer: there is an increase in wind farming
people can live and farm in new areas

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a human rights violation?

choices.answer: women must wear a burqa when they go outdoors
children are not allowed to vote
lack of security prevents children from getting an education

questions.question: Saudi Arabia exports oil and imports food from other countries.  This is an example of...
What is an important natural resource for human settlement patterns?
